source.name: question answering
source.instructions: **What kinds of questions can GPT-3 answer? Select all that apply.**

answers.answer: Questions that require complex logic to answer
Questions to which it could not know the answer

source.guidance: All of the above are correct. GPT-3 is a powerful model that accommodates a wide variety of questions that range from  simple to  complex. It can even respond in a coherent manner when it does not know the answer.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT describe the types of questions GOT-3 can answer
